trait.name: Glide
entries: If it isn't {@condition incapacitated} or wearing heavy armor, the hadozee can extend its skin membranes to move up to 5 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends in the air.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hadozee makes two Shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Musket
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d12 + 3}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The hadozee takes the Disengage or Hide action.

reaction.name: Safe Descent
entries: When it would take damage from a fall, the hadozee extends its skin membranes to reduce the fall's damage to 0, provided it isn't wearing heavy armor.
